game.name: Slot or Not
game.shortDescription: Deck-building turn-based slot machine battling adventure. Fight evil fruits aside your battle buddy slot machine to save your village. Spin your destiny and grab the precious loot in a fast paced colorful adventure.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Deck-building turn-based slot machine battling adventure. Fight evil fruits aside your battle buddy slot machine to save your village. Spin your destiny and grab the precious loot in a fast paced colorful adventure.
